title: Multi-model fan-out with concurrent requests
description: Multi-model fan-out feature enabling concurrent requests to multiple LLM providers. Users select models via transient UI (M key), and each response streams into its own src block with :model and :backend metadata for side-by-side comparison.
close_reason: Feature already implemented in ogent-ui.el. Verified: 6/6 multi-model fan-out tests pass. UI selection via 'M' key in transient, concurrent dispatch via dolist, response blocks tagged with :model/:backend metadata and model ID in headline.
